data.text: @manchesterbrown @GlobalNational So you can't produce a list. I thought so. It's predictable how you science deniers opt out as soon as you are asked for evidence.
@karinclewis @Michell06136611 @GlobalNational Here's some science for you. Pfizer finally released their side effects list. https://t.co/qHfG3b4KxL

@karinclewis @GlobalNational Vaccination is usually 90%-100% efficient. These jabs are at best 20% efficient at preventing infection. Natural immunity is best, which most people acquired after this last strain. Enjoy your subscription of endless jabs though, I’m opting out.
@karinclewis @GlobalNational You’re not following the science and you have zero ethics.
@manchesterbrown @GlobalNational Give me the list of the vaccines that are 100% guaranteed to stop infection. I'll wait.

@manchesterbrown @GlobalNational You genuinely, without irony, think you're being oppressed because of a choice you made? Considering that most people are vaccinated, you can be pretty sure no one's going into hiding. There's nothing to be ashamed of in supporting science and evidence.
@blackies1 @GlobalNational Rly... Plz look at the #Pfizer or #VaccineSideEffects trend and open your ayes
@Michell06136611 @GlobalNational unlike you they actually care for the animals, hence why they don't allow you folks to go in <3
@karinclewis @Michell06136611 @GlobalNational Lmao, you're delusional. The only information you have is propaganda from leftist paid media outlets.
